description: Main Flutter application entry point and widget tree setup for the Budget Tracker Pro app. It initializes dependencies, manages authentication state, and provides the main UI with tab navigation and settings.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up Provider and theme, handling authentication state to switch between login and home screens.

classes.name: _Splash
classes.description: Loading indicator shown during app initialization.

classes.name: _Home
classes.description: Main scaffold with bottom navigation to switch between different core screens.

classes.name: _SettingsScreen
classes.description: Settings page with user info, logout, and API URL display.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for each widget class, including core UI logic for display.
